text: @GovKemp Gyms and fitness centers? Yeah, I can’t imagine that going well. Glad I live in MI where the gov is relying on Drs to guide her decisions. GA’s gov is consulting the pres which relies on gut feelings, such as treating CoViD-19 with hydroxychloroquine. How’s that going?
